trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
An instance of the DetailsViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Do przechowywania formantami modułu stronicowania w jest tworzone wystąpienie DetailsViewPagerRow <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the DetailsViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>Interfejs jest znacznika, która wskazuje, czy formant DetailsViewPagerRow jest częścią <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>hierarchii kontroli obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa jest używana głównie przez deweloperów formantu.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: Formant deweloperzy mogą zastąpić <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>Konstruktor i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A>i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A>metody <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>klasy w celu utworzenia wiersza niestandardowego modułu stronicowania.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
The DetailsViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktor DetailsViewPagerRow wywołuje konstruktor klasy podstawowej <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, z określonymi parametrami.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the call is made with `rowIndex` equal to -1, `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>, and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: Dla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow>kontroli w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroli, połączenie jest nawiązywane z `rowIndex` równy -1, `rowType` równa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>, i `rowState` równa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
